title: What are anions and cations with examples? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ions are atoms with a net electrical charge which results from a gain or loss of electrons. When an electron is lost from an atom, a positive charge results and this is a Cation. When an electron is gained, a negative charge results and this is an Anion. Salt - NaCl - is an ionic compound - Sodium (Na), is the cation and Chlorine (Cl), is the anion. This cation-anion pair form sthe ionic bond in table salt.
